title: Price drop: Peer into your ears with your iPhone and this ear camera
description: The Smart Visual Ear Cleaner's camera gives you a clear view of what’s happening in your ear. It's a high-tech earwax removal method. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: The Smart Visual Ear Cleaner's camera gives you a clear view of what’s happening in your ear. It's a high-tech earwax removal method.
text: Daily deals Get a view of your ear canal with this discounted high-tech tool. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals This amazing ear camera will help you combat earwax buildup that can seriously impact your hearing. Earwax impaction occurs in 57% of older adults and 10% of children, But you don’t have to be stuck blindly going at it with a cotton swab (which experts recommend against, BTW). Use this earwax removal tool instead! The Smart Visual Ear Cleaner gives you a clear view of what’s happening in your ear — and a better way to clean up shop in there. You can get this earwax removal device for just $24.97. Ear camera gives HD view for easy earwax removal With this easy-to-use ear camera, you can stream a 360-degree, wide-angle view of your ear canal to your iPhone. The 1080P HD camera can help guide your hand so you can know exactly where you’re cleaning. The silicone ear spoons are designed to neatly scoop out wax without scratching the delicate inside of your ear. Soaking a warm compress is another common way of trying to clear out or soften earwax for removal. With that in mind, the Smart Visual Ear Cleaner is built with an IPX7 waterproof lens, so you can pair it with any water-based method of earwax removal. Also works in your mouth, nose, etc. Its waterproof lens and LED light mean you can even safely use this innovative earwax cleaner to check out your mouth before a trip to the dentist. Or you can take a look at your nasal cavity, throat or scalp roots. The 360 mAh battery supports 1.5 hours of continuous use, meaning this device boasts enough battery for 45 days’ worth of daily use. This earwax removal tool won’t stop buildup, but it can help you clean more regularly and carefully. Pairing this tool with simple solutions like avoiding in-ear headphones can also help further decrease wax buildup so you don’t need to clean your ears as often. Put the camera in your ear for safer earwax removal This ear-cleaning tool, which works with iPhones as well as Android devices, earned 4.5 out of 5 stars on our store. One user wrote, “I love the fact I can actually ‘see’ what I’m doing while cleaning my ears. No more Q-tip[s] prodding around and doing who knows what damage to my ears!” Skip the cotton swabs and get the Smart Visual Ear Cleaner, an ear camera with a storage box for $24.97 (regularly $39.99). Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the ear camera for iPhone-assisted earwax removal on February 12, 2023. We updated the pricing.
html:
• Daily deals

This amazing ear camera will help you combat earwax buildup that can seriously impact your hearing. Earwax impaction occurs in 57% of older adults and 10% of children, But you don’t have to be stuck blindly going at it with a cotton swab (which experts recommend against, BTW). Use this earwax removal tool instead!

The Smart Visual Ear Cleaner gives you a clear view of what’s happening in your ear — and a better way to clean up shop in there. You can get this earwax removal device for just $24.97.

Ear camera gives HD view for easy earwax removal

With this easy-to-use ear camera, you can stream a 360-degree, wide-angle view of your ear canal to your iPhone. The 1080P HD camera can help guide your hand so you can know exactly where you’re cleaning. The silicone ear spoons are designed to neatly scoop out wax without scratching the delicate inside of your ear.

Soaking a warm compress is another common way of trying to clear out or soften earwax for removal. With that in mind, the Smart Visual Ear Cleaner is built with an IPX7 waterproof lens, so you can pair it with any water-based method of earwax removal.

Also works in your mouth, nose, etc.

Its waterproof lens and LED light mean you can even safely use this innovative earwax cleaner to check out your mouth before a trip to the dentist. Or you can take a look at your nasal cavity, throat or scalp roots.

The 360 mAh battery supports 1.5 hours of continuous use, meaning this device boasts enough battery for 45 days’ worth of daily use. This earwax removal tool won’t stop buildup, but it can help you clean more regularly and carefully. Pairing this tool with simple solutions like avoiding in-ear headphones can also help further decrease wax buildup so you don’t need to clean your ears as often.

Put the camera in your ear for safer earwax removal

This ear-cleaning tool, which works with iPhones as well as Android devices, earned 4.5 out of 5 stars on our store. One user wrote, “I love the fact I can actually ‘see’ what I’m doing while cleaning my ears. No more Q-tip[s] prodding around and doing who knows what damage to my ears!”

Skip the cotton swabs and get the Smart Visual Ear Cleaner, an ear camera with a storage box for $24.97 (regularly $39.99).

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals
